summary:
Energetic leader that drives both organic growth and buy & build, with broad experience from previous roles as CEO, M&A Director and Sales Director working alongside private equity ownership in high growth IT companies. Strong expertise in Circular IT.

‚Ä¢ International experience living and working across Europe and USA
‚Ä¢ Board member with focus on growth, M&A, international expansion, leadership and commercial excellence
‚Ä¢ Worked alongside various private equity firms both in executive and non-executive roles or advisory functions 
‚Ä¢ Extensive executive leadership/management experience (up to 400 FTE across multiple international sites)
‚Ä¢ Strong business acumen and a solid understanding of financials and running a P&L
‚Ä¢ Advocating effective use of business intelligence and data-driven commercial optimization
